bugtrap03.model

Class DataModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • bugtrap03.model.DataModel

  • public class DataModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main controller of the system.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Group 03

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataModel

        public DataModel()
        The constructor of a DataModel

    • Method Detail

      • getHistory

        public purecollections.PList<ModelCmd> getHistory(int x)
        Get the last x ModelCmds added to the history of this DataModel. The most recently added ModelCmd will be in the first index of the list. When x is < 0 an empty list will be returned. When x is > the size of the history a list of the whole history will be returned.
        Parameters:
        x - The amount of ModelCmds to return. When less than 0 an empty List will be returned.
        Returns:
        The list of x last commands. All commands will be given when x is higher than the current amount.

      • undoLastChanges

        public boolean undoLastChanges(User user,
                               int x)
                        throws PermissionException
        Undo the last x possible model changes.
        When there are only y changes to undo (y < x) only y will be undone.
        As soon as the undoing of an action fails the undoing is stopped and false is returned.
        Parameters:
        x - The amount of changes to undo.
        Returns:
        True if all x changes were undone. When x <= 0 true is returned.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - When user == null or does not have sufficient permissions.

      • getUserList

        public purecollections.PList<User> getUserList()
        Get the list of users in this system.
        Returns:
        The list of users currently in this system.

      • getUserListOfExactType

        public <U extends User> purecollections.PList<U> getUserListOfExactType(java.lang.Class<U> userType)
        Get the list of users in this system who have the exact class type userType.
        Type Parameters:
        U - extends User type.
        Parameters:
        userType - The type of users returned.
        Returns:
        All users of this system who have the exact class type userType.

      • getUserListOfType

        public <U extends User> purecollections.PList<U> getUserListOfType(java.lang.Class<U> userType)
        Get the list of users in this system who are of type that is or extends userType.
        Type Parameters:
        U - extends User type.
        Parameters:
        userType - The type of users returned.
        Returns:
        All users of this system who have the exact class type userType or a class type that extends userType.

      • createProject

        public Project createProject(VersionID versionID,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             java.util.GregorianCalendar startDate,
                             Developer lead,
                             long budget,
                             User creator)
                      throws PermissionException
        This method creates a new Project in the system
        Parameters:
        versionID -
        name - The name of the project
        description - The description of the project
        startDate - The start date of the project
        lead - The lead developer of this project
        budget - The budget estimate for this project
        creator - The creator of this Project
        Returns:
        The created project
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the constructor of project fails
        PermissionException - If the given creator has insufficient permissions

      • getAllBugReports

        public purecollections.PList<BugReport> getAllBugReports(User user)
        This method gets all bug reports in the system that are visible to the given user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get all bug reports for. All bug reports will be visible for him. null would mean the bug report is visible to everyone.
        Returns:
        a list of all bug reports in the system that are visible for the user.
        See Also:
        BugReport.isVisibleTo(bugtrap03.bugdomain.usersystem.User)

      • updateProject

        public Project updateProject(Project proj,
                             User user,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             java.util.GregorianCalendar startDate,
                             java.lang.Long budgetEstimate)
                      throws PermissionException
        This method updates the given project with the new given attributes
        Parameters:
        name - The new name of the given project
        description - The new description of the given project
        startDate - The new startDate of the given project
        budgetEstimate - The new budget estimate of the given project
        Throws:
        PermissionException - if the given user doesn't have the needed permission to update a project.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When any of the arguments is invalid.
        Postconditions:
        The attributes of the given project will not be updated if an error was thrown

      • createBugReport

        @Ensures(value="result.getTag() == Tag.New && result.getUniqueID() != null")
public BugReport createBugReport(Subsystem subsystem,
                                                                                                               User user,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                               purecollections.PList<BugReport> dependencies,
                                                                                                               Milestone milestone,
                                                                                                               double impactFactor,
                                                                                                               boolean isPrivate)
                                                                                                        throws PermissionException
        This method creates and adds a bug report to the list of associated bugReports of this subsystem
        Parameters:
        subsystem - The subsystem the new bugreport belongs to
        user - The User that wants to create this bug report
        title - The title of the bugReport
        description - The description of the bugReport
        dependencies - The depended bug reports of this bug report
        milestone - The milestone of the bug report
        impactFactor - The impact factor of the new bug report
        isPrivate - The boolean that says if this bug report should be private or not
        Returns:
        The create bug report


        Postconditions:
        result.getDate() == current date at the moment of initialization
        Postconditions:
        result.getUniqueID() is an unique ID for this bug report
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreator(user) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidUniqueID(uniqueID) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidTitle(title) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDescription(description) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDependencies(dependencies) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidSubSystem(subsystem) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidMilestone(milestone) fails
        PermissionException - if the given creator doesn't have the needed permission to create a bug report
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidCreator(User), BugReport.isValidUniqueID(long), BugReport.isValidTitle(String), BugReport.isValidDescription(String), BugReport.isValidCreationDate(GregorianCalendar), BugReport.isValidDependencies(PList), BugReport.isValidSubsystem(Subsystem), BugReport.isValidMilestone(Milestone)

      • createBugReport

        @Ensures(value="result.getTag() == Tag.New && result.getUniqueID() != null")
public BugReport createBugReport(Subsystem subsystem,
                                                                                                               User user,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                               java.util.GregorianCalendar creationDate,
                                                                                                               purecollections.PList<BugReport> dependencies,
                                                                                                               Milestone milestone,
                                                                                                               double impactFactor,
                                                                                                               boolean isPrivate,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String trigger,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String stacktrace,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String error)
                                                                                                        throws PermissionException
        This method creates and adds a bug report to the list of associated bugReports of this subsystem
        Parameters:
        subsystem - The subsystem the new bugreport belongs to
        user - The User that wants to create this bug report
        title - The title of the bugReport
        description - The description of the bugReport
        creationDate - The creationDate of the bugReport
        dependencies - The depended bug reports of this bug report
        milestone - The milestone of the bug report
        impactFactor - the impact factor of the new bug report
        isPrivate - The boolean that says if this bug report should be private or not
        trigger - A trigger used to trigger the bug. Can be NULL.
        stacktrace - The stacktrace got when the bug was triggered. Can be NULL.
        error - The error got when the bug was triggered. Can be NULL.
        Returns:
        The create bug report


        Postconditions:
        if creationDate == null: result.getDate() == current date at the moment of initialization
        Postconditions:
        result.getUniqueID() is an unique ID for this bug report
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreator(user) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidUniqueID(uniqueID) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidTitle(title) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDescription(description) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreationDate(creationDate) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDependencies(dependencies) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidSubSystem(subsystem) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidMilestone(milestone) fails
        PermissionException - if the given creator doesn't have the needed permission to create a bug report
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidCreator(User), BugReport.isValidUniqueID(long), BugReport.isValidTitle(String), BugReport.isValidDescription(String), BugReport.isValidCreationDate(GregorianCalendar), BugReport.isValidDependencies(PList), BugReport.isValidSubsystem(Subsystem), BugReport.isValidMilestone(Milestone)

      • createComment

        public Comment createComment(User user,
                             BugReport bugReport,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws PermissionException
        This method creates a comment on a given BugReport
        Parameters:
        user - The creator of the comment
        bugReport - The bug report to create the comment on
        text - The text of the new comment
        Returns:
        The new generated comment
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given User doesn't have the permission to create the comment
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When bugReport == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given comment is not valid for this bug report
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidComment(Comment)

      • createComment

        public Comment createComment(User user,
                             Comment parentComment,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws PermissionException
        This method creates a comment on the given comment with the given text by the given user
        Parameters:
        user - The creator of the new comment
        parentComment - The comment to create the comment on (= sub comment)
        text - The text of the new Comment
        Returns:
        The new generated comment
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given User doesn't have the permission to create the comment
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When parentComment == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given parameters are not valid for this comment
        See Also:
        Comment.isValidSubComment(Comment)

      • cloneProject

        public Project cloneProject(Project cloneSource,
                            VersionID versionID,
                            Developer lead,
                            java.util.GregorianCalendar startDate,
                            long budgetEstimate)
        Clone the given Project and set a few attributes.
        Parameters:
        cloneSource - The project to clone from.
        versionID - The versionID for the clone project.
        lead - The lead developer for the clone project.
        startDate - The startDate for the clone project.
        budgetEstimate - The budgetEstimate for the clone project.
        Returns:
        The resulting clone.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Check @see.
        See Also:
        Project.cloneProject(VersionID, Developer, GregorianCalendar, long)

      • getDeveloperInProject

        public purecollections.PList<Developer> getDeveloperInProject(BugReport bugRep)
        This method returns all the developers associated with the project the bug report belongs to
        Parameters:
        bugRep - The bug report
        Returns:
        The list of all devs in the project
        See Also:
        BugReport.getSubsystem(), AbstractSystem.getAllDev()

      • addUsersToBugReport

        public void addUsersToBugReport(User user,
                                BugReport bugRep,
                                purecollections.PList<Developer> devList)
                         throws PermissionException
        This method adds all the users of the given list to the given project by the given user
        Parameters:
        user - The user that wants to add all the given developers to the bug report
        bugRep - The bug report to add all the developers to
        devList - The developers to add to the bug report
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given user doesn't have the needed permission to add users to the given bug report
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When user == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When bugRep == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given developer was not valid for this bug report

                            User user,

                            Role role)
                     throws PermissionException

        developer - The developer that gets a role assigned

      • addTest

        public void addTest(BugReport bugReport,
                    User user,
                    java.lang.String test)
             throws PermissionException
        This method adds a given test to the bug report state
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report to add the given test to
        user - The user that wants to add the test to this bug report state
        test - The test that the user wants to add
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given user doesn't have the permission to add a test
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the current state doesn't allow to add a test
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given test is not a valid test for this bug report state
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidTest(String)

      • addPatch

        public void addPatch(BugReport bugReport,
                     User user,
                     java.lang.String patch)
              throws PermissionException
        This method adds a given patch to this bug report state
        Parameters:
        bugReport - The bug report to add the patch to
        user - The user that wants to add the patch to this bug report state
        patch - The patch that the user wants to submit
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given user doesn't have the permission to add a patch to this bug report state
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the given patch is invalid for this bug report
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given patch is not valid for this bug report state
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When bugReport == null

                 throws PermissionException

        patch - The patch that the user wants to select

      • splitSubsystem

        public Subsystem splitSubsystem(Subsystem subsystem,
                                java.lang.String subsystem1Name,
                                java.lang.String subsystem1Desc,
                                java.lang.String subsystem2Name,
                                java.lang.String subsystem2Desc,
                                purecollections.PList<Subsystem> subsystems1,
                                purecollections.PList<BugReport> bugReports1,
                                User user)
                         throws PermissionException
        Split the given subsystem into 2 subsystems, subsystem and a newly created one.
        subsystem will keep all the direct subsystems and bugReports that are also contained in the list subsystems1 or bugReports1 respectively... The rest will go to subsystem2.
        Parameters:
        subsystem - The Subsystem to split into itself and another newly created Subsystem.
        subsystem1Name - The new name for subsystem.
        subsystem1Desc - The new description for subsystem.
        subsystem2Name - The name for subsystem 2 resulting from the split.
        subsystem2Desc - The description for subsystem 2 resulting from the split.
        subsystems1 - The list of subsystems to keep in subsystem.
        bugReports1 - The list of bugReports to keep in subsystem.
        user - The user who wants to split the given subsystem.
        Returns:
        The extra newly created subsystem, subsystem 2. The other subsystem, subsystem 1 remains as subsystem.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - When the user does not have sufficient permissions
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When subsystem == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When user == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When any of the arguments passed is invalid for a subsystem.

      • mergeSubsystems

        public Subsystem mergeSubsystems(User user,
                                 Subsystem subsystem1,
                                 Subsystem subsystem2,
                                 java.lang.String newName,
                                 java.lang.String newDescription)
                          throws PermissionException
        This method safely merges 2 subsystems together
        Parameters:
        user - The user that wants to merge the subsystems
        subsystem1 - The first subsystem to merge
        subsystem2 - The second subsystem to merge
        newName - The new name of the merged subsystem
        newDescription - The new description of the merged subsystem
        Returns:
        The merged subsystem
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When there is an illegal argument passed.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - When there is a null where it shouldn't. Read ModelCmd specific documentation.
        PermissionException - When the user does not have sufficient permissions
